title: Oxtail soup with mini parsley dumplings
description: A really warming traditional winter soup with added dumplings, so there’s no need for bread.
ingredients: 1 whole oxtail (around 1.3kg/3lb), cut into chunky pieces
flaked sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 litres/3½ pints beef stock, made with 2 beef stock cubes
2 tbsp yeast extract, such as Marmite
